Text: Tanks A Lot from LaurenLauren has just sent you a greeting card from Bluemountaincom You can pick up your personal message here cardsboxepwmjtbfgnnauhtml Your card will be available for the next days This service is FREE Have a good day and have fun Accessing your card indicates agreement with Blue Mountains Website Rules homeWebsiteRuleshtml Send FREE Blue Mountain cards to friends and family and attach gifts too

SIDE LETTER FOR ALLEGHENY ISDAis attached for your review note it is the first letter of two in the document This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately Allegheny ENRON side lettersvDOC

REVISED ALLEGHENY SIDE LETTER FOR ISDAsee attached Let me know if this is acceptable Thanks Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC

Rerevised Allegheny Side Letter for ISDA Cc for your comments I have reflected them in the attached draft marked to show your changes The governing law provision is a formulation that we have used at SC to accomplish the purpose of giving effect to NYGOL and should achieve the purpose of the language you added to the power master amendment I was planning to conform the latter to the language used here unless you have an objection Allegheny has not yet reviewed this draft so it remains subject to their comment I also need Yair to confirm that he is happy with the new Part Commodity Definitions section Yair this is attached as Exhibit C to the attached document Let me know if you have any further questions or comments Thanks Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC

Comment on Enron Guaranty Cc our comments on the Guaranty which in sum relate to referencing the MLCS transactions in the recitals and bringing this version in line with what was agreed with Allegheny in the Guaranty under the Power Master I have faxed the latter document to you Please let me know if you have any questions or comments This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately Exhibit AvREDDOC

RE AlleghenyEnron side letter re ISDA AgreementOriginal Message From Sent Monday March PM To Teigland Lauren Subject Re AlleghenyEnron side letter re ISDA Agreement Lauren Par xiii second and fourth lines the word Guaranty should be replaced by the word guaranty and the words the Guaranty should be replaced with that guaranty respectively Exhibit B Guaranty first and final paragraphs change the date to March Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax ul lcromcom To cc Subject AlleghenyEnron side letter re ISDA Agreement PM Sara attached is a blackline which shows some minor changes we have made to the above to fix some nitsclarify exhibit references Let me know if you have any questions or comments Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvDOC This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately See attached file Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvDOC This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately

TRANSFER AND ASSUMPTION AGREEMENT Cc markup incorporates further comments to Section of the above based on a discussion with Yair Yaish WXDOC This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately WXDOC

FINAL ISDA side letteris attached for your review clean and blacklined versions This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvDOC Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC

SIGNING LOGISTICS Cc we will soon be ready to exchange signature pages at long last We await only the parties final sign off on the schedule of trades being transferred Below are the proposed logistics for signing TRANSFER AND ASSUMPTION AGREEMENT Each party to execute originals a Enron and SC to fax an executed signature page for this document to Kate Polozie at McDermott Will Emery fax no b Enron and SC to send five original signature pages via overnight courier to Kate Polozie McDermott Will Emery th St NW Washington DC c Kate will compile and distribute complete documents to all parties once all originals are received POWER MASTER AMENDMENT ISDA SIDE LETTER Each party to execute originals a Enron to fax an executed signature page for each document to Lauren Teigland SC fax no Enron to retain one original and send one original signature page for each document via overnight courier to Lauren Teigland Sullivan Cromwell Broad Street New York NY b SC to fax signature pages for each document to Janice Moore and Sara Shackleton fax no SC to retain one original and send one original signature page for each document via overnight courier to Enron to confirm Janice MooreSara Shackleton Enron Power Marketing Inc Smith Street Houston TX Please let me know if you have any questionscomments about the above Best regards Lauren This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately
